Item.infoText: Fight Training: Training to raise overall physical abilities. HP, STR and AGI increase evenly, and you can also learn new talon skills when your fight level increases.
Running: Stamina training for HP increase. It also increases some AGI. HP recovered after defense is increased as the stamina level increases.
Muscle Training: Training for strength and defense. Summons a large boulder to train muscles. Damage reduction percent increases as the muscle level increases.
Magic Training: Increases MAG and MP evenly. Fires magic power quickly. You can learn new magic power talon skills when your magic level increases.

Meditation: Meditate on top of the sap to train magic power actualization. MP increases greatly after training, and some MAG increases as well. MP consumed for casting magic greatly decreases as the mind level increases.

Magic Power Release: Release magic power to your limit to greatly increase MAG. MP also increases slightly. Magical strength of drawing magic circles greatly increases as the magic power level increases, and you can learn new magic skills at the last stage.

Training performance increases as training efficiency approaches 100%. Training efficiency decreases greatly each time you train, so we recommend training what is currently more important to the Witch first. Training cannot progress when the training efficiency is 20% or less, but it will slowly recover as time passes through external activities such as combat.
Talon Upgrade: Basic talon attack power increases to 125% as your talons are imbued with the power of lightning.
Sphere Bomb: Channels an explosive electric energy sphere in your hand, then explode it at once to deal 220% MAG damage to nearby targets.

Conduction: Conducts electrical energy with each attack to deal damage to all targets. The damage begins equal to MAG, then decreases as it conducts to another target. As conduction progresses its MP cost increases, and it will stop when you lack enough MP,

Body Upgrade: Consumes 40% of HP and MP to cloak your body with electrical energy. All abilities except DEF increase by 50% when in action, and the Body Upgrade effect decreases by half on the next action. The effect of Body Upgrade ceases on the third turn.
3-Attack: Attacks a target quickly three times (for 80-100% damage).

Jump: Jumps up high to crush down a target. Deals 200% STR damage to the selected target, and deals 100% STR damage to nearby targets. Other attack effects that occur in the instant are increased by 20%.
7-Attack: Attacks a target quickly seven times (for 60-80% damage).
Dash: Quickly moves towards a target and deals critical damage in proportion to STR and MAG.
This effect has already been bestowed!
AGI decreases by #power% until the next action.
The selected tools are already listed.
Secondary Slot | Magic effect +10%, MP cost -10%

Moccamori is blessed by Agamo. Moccamori's base abilities increase to #power% when in combat.

Delete record on line #num? Deleted records cannot be restored.
Cannot enter special characters in diary titles.
A button to open the diary will appear when you approach the diary. Open the diary to record the current time and load it later. Try opening your diary.
Press the upper left button to go to 'Record diary' and the right button to go to 'Load diary'. 'Record diary' can save the current time, and 'Load diary' can load a saved record.
All HP and MP recovered by sound sleep!
Moccamori can dispatch minions to specific regions for gathering tools.
Dispatched minions will gather tools at the dispatched region for a limited time, and save Moccamori time and effort.
Undispatched minions await Moccamori's summon in the lobby. minions summoned during battle will help Moccamori in battle depending on its characteristics.
Press the field menu button on the lower right.
Drag the map togo the Eastern Pruto Forest displayed in blue.
Press the [Dispatch minion] to select a minion to dispatch.
The magic ingredient Shukrina must gather is [Blue Hedgehog Spine].
Skipping diary guide because there is a previously saved diary record.
Let's try to record the current game on the first line.
Shukrina left for [Eastern Pruto Forest] by Moccamori's order.
Go to your room and use the teleport magic circle.
Stand on the magic circle on the middle of the room to use the teleport magic circle.
This minion has already been summoned.
Speed of the next turn decreased by #power%.
Use the return spell to access the room quickly.
First, select a target to craft.
Press the button to begin craft.
First, to select a magic power medium, select the middle slot.
Equip the magic power medium displayed on the right.
Select a type slot to bestow type to the magic power medium.
Type slots consist of main type and supportive type. The two buttons to decide a type are the button below the magic power medium button.
First, let's equip the tier 1 electric magic circle you just crafted on the main slot.
Select the tier 1 electric magic circle displayed on the right.
Moccamori moves around rooms on a chair. Press the exclamation mark that appeared on the chair.
Press the exclamation button that appears when you go to the center of the lobby.
Moccamori uses her talons to attack targets.
If there are multiple targets, try using [Earth Smash] that can attack several at once.
[Talon Strike] is effective against single targets.
Use blast attacks on large targets to deal greater damage.
[Talon Strike] is effective against single targets.
The opponent will take action when the blue bar under its health bar is full.
Focusing on defense will greatly reduce the damage Moccamori receives, and recover some HP and MP for the next turn.
The Magic Power Awakening stat increases in proportion to the damage received and the MP spent.
When the Magic Power Awakening stat is full, Moccamori can use powerful weapons.
Spend MP to fill the Magic Power Awakening stat.
Your Magic Power Awakening stat is full. Press the Magic Power Awakening button to summon Moccamori's weapons.
Try to press on the attack.
Tap the ground to move Moccamori.

The magic for drawing magic circles costs much MP and takes longer for the next turn to come. However, its power is immense and can result in advantageous effects by linking it with other types of attacks.
Enemies hit by lightning magic are weakened. Attack an enemy with another lightning type attack to deal more damage.
Obtain tools by approaching sparkling objects.

Moccamori will receive poison damage at each of her turns when she is poisoned. The poison damage will stack with more attacks, and ignores all defensive effects. Poison damage disappears after battle.
Magic Fusion can create HP potions. Crafted HP potions are incredibly useful in battle, as they recover HP by percentage.
It is essential to have an empty bottle to fill with HP potion. You can get empty bottles at the town tool merchant. Go outside of the lobby to travel to town.
You can upgrade the Soul Stone by standing beneath the Soul Stone in the lobby center.
You cannot initiate training when the training efficiency drops below 20%. Training efficiency recovers with time.
The time to wait for the next turn has increased significantly.
To craft a recovery potion for battle, you must obtain an [Empty Bottle] from the tool merchant in Pruto Village.
You can go to Pruto Village by exiting the lobby.
The current location has been added to the teleport list.

Battle health potions recover health by percentage, making them useful till the latter part of the game. Battle health potions can be crafted in the [Royal Chamber], just like creating magic circles through magic fusion.
You can trade up to 100 items at once.
The current amount is the maximum for selling.
Ride Nuuk to travel to regions inaccessible by road.
Open the Ürphean Continent Map to select a region to travel to.
Look for the White Rock Mountain region.

Training done at high training efficiency will raise to the next level more quickly.
Moccamori is already in her hideout.
As Moccamori's health potions recover HP by percentage, they are useful even at the latter stages of the game.
Check your HP and MP before a huge fight.
Training efficiency will increase when sufficient time has passed since the last training. Try to train after checking the training efficiency.

A magic circle cannot be designated as a favorite tool.
Moccamori looked at the large seal stone in detail.
Basic abilities are displayed as 100%. Press the basic ability button to switch to combat ability info.
You have no supportive equipment equipped.
HP is your health. When HP becomes 0, you cannot fight and the game will be over. You can increase HP with tools or by training.
MP is your mental power. Higher MP enables more magic use. You can increase MP with tools or by training.
MAG is the strength of your magic. Higher MAG leads to greater magical strength, which can be increased with tools or by training.
Higher STR enables greater physical damage. You can increase STR with tools or by training.
Higher DEF reduces damage received in battle. Basically, damage is reduced depending on the DEF stat, and is reduced in percentages with higher defense levels.
Higher AGI enables Moccamori's turn to come faster. In battle, the AGI boost due to Soul Stone is not as high as the other stats.
An unknown creature beings to absorb Moccamori's HP.
This target cannot be duplicated for crafting.
This magic index has already been added to the crafting index.
A new recipe has been added to the crafting index!
How do you want to use this tool?

When Moccamori enters battle, her basic stats increase many times due to Agamo's blessing. Currently, basic stats increase by 200% in battle, and this will increase more when you upgrade the Soul Stone.
Disable the barrier and begin battle with the opponent?

How do you want to respond?

You can camp outside using a tent. All HP and MP are restored after camping, and you can record the current time on your diary. The tent is sold by the Pruto Village merchant.
There is a small cairn is barely standing in a strange fashion.
How will you respond to the request of Lunata Chief?
Moccamori forcibly took the Red Gem from the chief.
How will you respond to the workshop owner?
I will take the Flame Stone
You have obtained a tasty fruit. How will you respond?
The sound of the silver coins being to jingle.
Arkas found Noa's necklace inside the statue.
Arkas threw Noa's necklace into the fairy's pool.

How will you respond to the warriors?
You have returned magic power to Denny.
You see a large space under the mine. Do you want to go down?
Go up to the upper mine floor?
This region's location cannot be recognized.
Choosing good deeds from the selection increases your reputation, and not doing so decreases it. Reputation affects the ending.
You're already equipped with this special equipment.
You cannot summon this minion now.
You cannot use the minimap in this region.

[Quick hunt mode]^nWhen the opponent's HP is lower than Moccamori's MAG or STR, Moccamori will instantly hunt down the opponent and obtain tools without entering battle. The quick hunt mode can be disabled or enabled in the settings window. However, the quick hunt mode may not be available in certain events.
Absorbed the opponent's life force to recover #power HP.
Slowed down the opponent's actions by #power% with the freeze effect.
The opponent is now weak against electric type attacks.
The opponent has resistance against freeze effects.
Fire magic has removed the freeze effect on the opponent.
Ice magic has removed the burn effect on the opponent.
The opponent has resistance against burn effects.
The damage received by the opponent has been reflected towards Moccamori.
Open the map of Ürphea here to enable sky travel.

Moccamori has been slowed down by the opponent's ice type attack.
This target is already in battle.

Eat Libro's food and cancel the meeting with Ethan.
Head to the Crystal Cave with Ethan.
Must wait a very long time.
Edis will not cooperate in the current battle.
#name login is required for cloud backup. Would you like to login to #name?

Opponents hit with lightning magic become vulnerable to lightning type attacks. When Moccamori uses similar lightning magic or talons imbued with lightning type, she can deal much greater damage than normal.

Opponents hit with fire magic receive burns, which deal extra damage to the enemy that is attacked. Enemies with burns are vulnerable to multiple attacks in a single turn. However, burn effects are negated by ice magic.
Ice magic greatly decreases an enemy's AGI, enabling more actions to come to allies. However, freeze effects are negated by fire magic.
Magic mediums determine the characteristics of magic, such as its shape, attack method and basic power.
The main magic circle usually enhances the power of the magic medium and bestows certain type to the medium to create advantageous effects in battle.
The supportive magic circle functions similarly to the main magic circle, but has lesser power. However, the supportive and main magic circles in a single slot cannot consist of identical types.

When the magic power awakening stat is full during battle, Moccamori can attempt to awaken her magic power. When Moccamori awakens her magic power, she can summon all the Agamo weapons to sue powerful skills. HP and MP are recovered right after a magic power awakening, which can only be maintained for a short time.
Magic power awakening and talon attacks
When the magic power awakening stat increases during battle, talon attack power increases up to 2.5 times. Talon attack power greatly increases as the battle progresses.

Normal attack and explosive attack^n^nNormal attacks can damage a single enemy per attack, and explosive attacks can damage all enemies within the explosion area. Large enemies will be hit multiple times by the explosions when receiving explosive attacks.

With sufficient magic power collected after a battle, the Soul Stone will be automatically upgraded, and will fully heal Moccamori's HP and MP.
Thanks for your playing through to the end!^nTap the screen to go to the title screen.
